articles.title: Rivian rolls back big price increases on preorders after customer backlash - CNBC

articles.content:
Rivian Automotive quickly backtracked from a plan to increase prices on vehicles that had already been ordered by customers.
In a letter to stakeholders on Thursday, Rivian CEO RJ Scaringe acknowled… [+1595 chars]
